author: mrglavas
msg: Eliminate creation of temporary Boolean objects.

author: crogers
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-1060 - controls declared with private or default (package) level access in a super class were not initialized  correctly in a derived page flow class.

The change includes generating the appropriate ClientInitializer as well making sure the NetUI JavaControlUtils.getAccessibleControlFieldAnnotations() method also checks for private control field(s) of a super class.
Added a new test for this bug to the NetUI BVT as well.
Tests: Control drt, NetUI BVT (WinXP pass)

author: sebor
msg: (UserCtype<UserChar>): Defined in terms of the above.

author: jboynes
msg: convert AtomicComponent to support init level
